```{r}
#| message: false
#| echo: false
classes <- c(
  as.Date("2025-09-08") + lubridate::ddays(0:13*7), 
  as.Date("2025-09-10") + lubridate::ddays(0:13*7)
) |>
  sort()

i <- 0
echo_date <- function() {
  i <<- i + 1
  x <- classes[i] |>
    format("%a, %b %e")
  htmltools::div(
    class = "card-header",
    "data-date" = classes[i],
    htmltools::h4(paste0(i, ". ", x))
  )
}

activity <- function() {
  paste(fontawesome::fa("chart-line"), "Activity:")
}
slides <- function() {
  paste(fontawesome::fa("microphone"), "Mini-lecture:")
}
quiz <- function() {
  paste(fontawesome::fa("code"), "Quiz:")
}
```
